content: इरिणं [ऋ-इनच्-किदिच्च <ls>Uṇ. 2. 51</ls>] {@--1@} A salt ground, saline soil; यथेरिणे बीजमुप्त्वा न वप्ता लभते फलं <ls>Ms. 3. 142</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 151.</ls> {@--2@} Hence, a bare or barren soil, desert, dreary region. {@--3@} Non-support. {@--4@} A rivulet, well (<ab>Ved.</ab>). {@--5@} A hollow, hole.
